title: fsx simchech a300 fmc update
description:
Features

There are several GPS based retrofits available for real life A300 users,
most are based around a GPS module which provides lateral guidance
information to the A300 autopilot and flight director system. Some
systems only feature a GPS control display unit (CDU), others also
include an Electronic Horizontal Situation Indicator (EHSI) with
Electronic Flight Information System (EFIS) controlers.
We have created a package which is based on the Honeywell HT9100
GPS CDU and the Honeywell FDS-2000 EHSI and ND.
The system features one GPS CDU (with dual screens in the VC) and 2
independent EHSI displays each with its own EFIS controller.
